bio:

Over the last 6 years, I have promoted large number of websites as freelancer by doing SEO, running PPC campaigns, handled full fledged Internet Marketing & branding campaigns, generating user engagement through social media (SMO). My vision is to buildup a carrier with oDesk. I would like to be a Search Engine Optimizer, Search Engine Marketer and also would like to work a lot of project to gain world class experience.I have a very good deal of experience doing manual/white-hat back link creation like rss creation and submis
